name: A SALAMI_SWAMI Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using letters from SALAMI_SWAMI, what is a 4-letter word meaning letters, bills, and (sometimes) junk, that the postman gives you?
questions.explanation:
Mail.

	Mail is delivered usually in a mailbox.  Sometimes a mailbox is a single box for your home, a box of slots somewhere near your home for many different houses, or several slots in a post office.  Sometimes people send you letters and packages, other times you get bills you must pay, and sometimes it is ads trying to get you to buy something, which is known as junk mail.

questions.text: Using letters from SALAMI_SWAMI, find a 4-letter word meaning to move around in the water?
questions.explanation:
Swim & Swam.

	To swim is to move around in the water with your arms and legs.  The past tense of swim is both swam and swum.

questions.text: Using letters from SALAMI_SWAMI, find a type of bean, or a capital city in South America.
questions.explanation:
Lima.

	Lima is the capital of Peru, a country in South America.  Lima beans are green legumes similar to beans.  They look like large kidney beans, and many kids think they are very gross.  But they are not!  Try some!

questions.text: Using letters found in my username, SALAMI_SWAMI, find a Mexican sauce and dance that is 5 letters long.
questions.explanation:
Salsa.

	Salsa can be spicy, it can be sweet, or it can be savory.  There are many different ways to prepare salsa, but one thing they all have in common is that salsa is made with tomatoes.  Salsa is also a type of dance, just like the foxtrot or Viennese waltz!

questions.text: Find a 3-letter word, using only letters from SALAMI_SWAMI, that means to try to hit a target.
questions.explanation:
Aim.

	You may have heard someone say "ready... aim... fire!"  When they say aim, they mean to get ready and lock onto a target.  For instance, in darts, you may aim for the center of the board, but you may not always hit where you were aiming.  ;-)

questions.text: Using only letters from SALAMI_SWAMI, find a 4-letter word that means you did not hit your target.
questions.explanation:
Miss.

	To miss something means you did not hear it, did not hit it, or did not get it.  Miss can also mean an unmarried woman.

questions.text: Using letters from SALAMI_SWAMI, find a 4-letter word that means to travel on a boat, or a part of the boat.
questions.explanation:
Sail.

	To set sail means to ride off in a boat.  Sails allow the boat to move, usually by allowing blowing winds to hit the sails, which pushes the boat along.

questions.text: Using only letters from my name, SALAMI_SWAMI, find a word meaning skinny, that is 4 letters long.
questions.explanation:
Slim.

	Slim, according to the dictionary, means thin, slender, or not fat.  It can also mean small, such as "your odds are slim to none", which means you have a very little chance.

questions.text: Using letters from SALAMI_SWAMI, find a 3-letter word that is a blade that cuts things, also a word that may follow "see".
questions.explanation:
Saw.

	A saw is an instrument that can cut things, usually wood.  For instance, a saw blade that is on a saw tables is round and cuts wooden planks and other materials.  Saw is also the past tense of "see", and a see-saw, or teeter-totter, is a piece of playground equipment.

questions.text: Using letters found in SALAMI_SWAMI, find a 5-letter word for a popular beach in Florida.
questions.explanation:
Miami.

	Miami is a popular beach in Florida, where it is warm almost all the time.  Miami is not the capital of Florida, however.  The capital of Florida is Tallahassee.
